Pre-Game Insights: India and Qatar are both coming into this game with a win in their opening matches
Both teams have a tremendous home record this year and are unbeaten so far on their home soil
India will want to capitalize on their newly found confidence after their first away win this year
Qatar will want to make their first-ever trip to India a memorable one
Predicted Line-up: India (4-3-3): Gurpreet Singh Sandhu; Nikhil Poojary, Rahul Bheke, Sandesh Jhingan, Akash Mishra; Lalengmawia, Suresh Wangjam, Sahal Abdul Samad; Lallianzuala Chhangte, Sunil Chhetri, Naorem Mahesh Singh
Qatar (4-4-2): Al Sheeb; Hassan, Khoukhi, Al Rawi, Haddadi; Hatem, Boudiaf, Al Ahraq, Al Haydos; Mohammad, Ali
